Name: Dawn of Griseo
About the game: *** English translation is in preparation *** A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists. Summary . Tino, a boy living in a rural farming village, one day meets Silvia, a girl who is a dark wizard, who had collapsed from hunger. The boy, who has a yearning for magic, decides to go with the girl. Their little adventure leads to encounters between people who were never meant to meet, intersections of destinies that were never meant to intersect, and the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed. Other Characteristics - It take 4-6 hours to play this game. - This game has 2 endings. - The theme song was composed by Sapporo Momoko. Please watch the movie at the top of this page.
